Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:7.0a1) Gecko/20110602 Firefox/7.0a1

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Left-click on the List all tabs icon
2. Hover the mouse over an arbitrary tab entry
3. Press the Escape key

Actual Results:
The Status bar shows the URL from the previously hovered tab.

Expected Results:
No Status bar visible.

comments.raw_text: I can confirm this. The status bar with URL stays there even when moving the mouse around the window. Even clicking no page area does not dismiss it. It disappears only after hovering over any link and moving away from it.
